title: Mayuri Jhumka: Exquisite Peacock Motif Earrings
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold). Adorned with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones offering diamond-like brilliance and a vibrant Ruby accent. Finished with a traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster and rich golden hue.
features: Features a finely crafted peacock (Mayuri) motif, a symbol of beauty and grace in South Indian culture. The intricate design includes delicate floral filigree detailing, meticulously set CZ stones, and three dangling gold orbs enhancing movement and shimmer. Inspired by Temple Jewelry traditions.
colors: Predominantly gold with sparkling clear CZ stones
complemented by a vibrant Ruby providing a captivating contrast.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (పెళ్ళి)
and traditional ceremonies (సంప్రదాయ వేడుకలు). Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary outfits for parties or formal events.
description: A timeless design that blends traditional South Indian artistry with modern aesthetics. The high-quality CZ stones offer diamond-like brilliance at an accessible price point. The peacock motif holds cultural significance, making it a meaningful piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures durability and long-lasting shine.
